basic.title: Monthly AI Market Trend Report
basic.prompt: Analyze recent market trends for the given industry and predict shifts over the next 30 days.

basic.title: Competitor Pricing Snapshot
basic.prompt: Gather recent pricing data from competitors in the specified market sector.

pro.title: Product Demand Prediction
pro.prompt: Using historical sales trends, forecast demand for the given product category over the next quarter.

pro.title: AI SWOT + Pricing Recommendations
pro.prompt: Perform a SWOT analysis and suggest optimized pricing strategies for maximizing revenue.

enterprise.title: Real-Time Alerts & Benchmarks
enterprise.prompt: Monitor industry-wide pricing fluctuations and deliver immediate insights for competitive positioning.

enterprise.title: Interactive Dashboard Access
enterprise.prompt: Provide a dynamic overview of ongoing trends, combining real-time AI-generated insights.
